content: Just landed back in NYC. The skyline feels both comforting and a bit intimidating after Japan.

content: Unpacking and reflecting. My sketchbook is filled with Japanese landscapes. Maybe it's time to get back into art.

content: Found a local art class in Brooklyn. They’re teaching Sumi-e. Excited to see if I can capture some of that zen.

content: Struggled with the brush strokes today. It’s not as easy as it looks. Missed the precision of coding.

content: They say art is about letting go of control. Today, I painted without planning. Felt liberating but also terrifying.

content: Finally, a breakthrough in class. My instructor said my work has 'soul'. Maybe I can blend tech with art?
